line.line: "Welcome, welcome! We've got everything you need here, all at a good price. What can I help you with?"

scene.line: "Hello again! What can I help you with?"

scene.choice: I'm looking for Andre Wallace. You seen him?
I've got some more questions about Andre.

scene.line: The shopkeeper looks down his glasses at you.
"I see a lot of people. What makes you think I know anything about this 'Andre'?"
scene.choice: He lives in this building. Figured he might have dropped by once or twice.
[Intimidate] I'm growing impatient. Tell me what you know or this gets messy.
[200 credits] Just a hunch. This might refresh your memory.
You know what, you probably don't know anything anyway.

scene.line: "He might have. Can't say I'm inclined to tell you. Information is a commodity, and commodities do not come free."

line.line: The shopkeeper puts up his hands.
"Okay, okay. Fine. Ask your damn questions."
"If you think you can threaten me in my own store, you're wrong. There are much, much larger threats than yourself, and I'm very much prepared to defend myself and my property."
A smirk comes across the shopkeepers face. He straightens his glasses.
"See, I like people who know how to conduct business. You've got questions, ask away."

scene.choice: When did you last see Andre?
Was Andre acting strange when you last saw him?
